column4: hello, i am a newbie on ubuntu,, im using Ubuntu 9.04 / Linux version 2.6.28-19 server, i have my broadcom 5786 (VEN = 14E4  | DEV = 4727) i am seeking a driver for that network adapter, anyone can lead the way?
try a search for the b43 driver. it may cover your driver.
ill do a search quick and see if i find anything
ty, im also diong that now as i can see that they have drivers near to the DEV and VER but i did not find the exact one till now..
i think tg3 is the archive file extension
that is the direct link to the download for your driver
great i downloaded it and i've opened it, i found many files in it including an .rpm extension file
extract the files and read the readme
wait i saw smt called Installing Source RPM Package
extract the tar.gz file that is inside the orignal archive
i will do that, i saw smt called Building Driver From TAR File also
read that. everything you need is in that archive
i would be hppy to keep helping you, but i have to leave for football practice
ow.. ty and well good game
no problem! have a great day
